text: Lawrencetown is a village within Annapolis County in the Annapolis Valley of Nova Scotia, Canada. The town was first settled in 1760 and named after Nova Scotia governor Charles Lawrence.Bernard, B., Bishop, G., Fowler, J., et al. "Early Settlers" . (1977). Lawrencetown Consolidated. the population was 636, an increase of 23.3% over the previous five years. ==References== ==Other websites== *Village of Lawrencetown *Lawrencetown Consolidated School *A History of Lawrencetown Category:Villages in Nova Scotia
title: Lawrencetown, Annapolis County
